title: The pilgrime of Casteele
author: Vega, Lope de, 1562-1635.
publisher: Printed by [E. Allde for] John Norton,
notes: A translation of: Vega, Lope de.  El peregrino en su patria.
In the Worcester College (University of Oxford). Library copy of STC 24630.5, the translation is ascribed in contemporary MS. to William Dutton.--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
